events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You arrive at the location specified on your coordinates, but find Kallenn’s facility on full lockdown with your quarry barricaded inside. The courtyard is crawling with Imperial guards, and you see a console display blinking. And from inside the facility you can hear the muffled pounding and roaring of the various creatures Kallenn keeps captive.

{-} Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the two blue highlighted spaces.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The main console of the power generator is blinking and humming. As long as there are stormtroopers protecting it, it's impossible to focus on shutting it down.

{-} When the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated, a hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.

eventActions.tbText: A squad of experienced stormtroopers appears to be guarding the generator console.

{-} When the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated, a hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated, a hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
With Kallenn dead and the base destroyed, the remaining Imperial forces flee in fear. “You did good work,” your ally says. “Hopefully the next time I see you we'll still be on the same side."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

eventActions.tbText:
When you return to the palace, Bib Fortuna and the guards escort you into the main throne room. 

Jabba gives out a deep belly laugh and begins to speak in Huttese, while a droid interprets. "The Mighty Jabba is pleased with your loyalty. He is aware of the purpose of your mission and is willing to help if you will do one more job for him. The meddlesome Empire has established aan orbital defense and logistics base near the Great Pit of Carkoon. Jabba commands you to steal the security codes from this base, which will allow him to regain mastery of Tatooine. Do this, and Jabba will deliver your civilians to a safe haven."

{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission card "Moment of Fate" into play.

events.eventText:
As his troops hold you back with covering fire, Kallenn escapes into his shuttle, mocking you as he flies away. The only word you can make out from your bounty hunter ally is "disappointing".

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.tbText:
When you return to the palace, Bib Fortuna and the guards escort you into the main throne room. 

Jabba gives out a deep belly laugh and begins to speak in Huttese, while a droid interprets. "The Mighty Jabba is pleased with your loyalty. He is aware of the purpose of your mission and is willing to help if you will do one more job for him. The meddlesome Empire has established aan orbital defense and logistics base near the Great Pit of Carkoon. Jabba commands you to steal the security codes from this base, which will allow him to regain mastery of Tatooine. Do this, and Jabba will deliver your civilians to a safe haven."

{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission card "Moment of Fate" into play.

events.eventText: The console light blinks more rapidly as you hear the sounds of machinery powering down. Kallenn appears from behind his hiding place shouting orders at his remaining guards.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The main console of the power generator is blinking and humming. As long as there are stormtroopers protecting it, it's impossible to focus on shutting it down.

{-} When the <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> have been defeated, a hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.

eventActions.customText:
{A} ORDER: Another Imperial figure with a figure cost of 9 or less that can perform an attack attacks {R1}.
{A} Move 4 away from the <color="red">Rancor</color>.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1}.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1}.
{A} Move 3 to engage the other Imperial figure (except the <color="red">Rancor</color>) with the most Health remaining.
{A} If this figure is not adjacent to another Imperial figure, move 4 away from the <color="red">Rancor</color>.
{A} Recover 2 {H}.
{-} COWER: If adjacent to another Imperial figure, recover 2 {H}. The adjacent non-<color="red">Focused</color> Imperial figure with the highest figure cost becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

eventActions.tbText: {-} Kallenn performs an additional action during each activation and may perform multiple attacks during each activation.
Cloaks and shields drop revealing the facility’s exposed power cells.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The power cells of Kallenn's facility hum with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.

The power cells of Kallenn's facility hum with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.

eventActions.tbText: {-} Imperial mission tokens represent power cells. A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.
Behind you you hear a terrible crashing as a massive and ferocious beast emerges, now freed from its cage.

eventActions.repositionText:
<color="red">Rancor</color>: Be adjacent to Kallenn.
{-} All others: Block access to the power cells.

eventActions.tbText:
Kallenn cowers in fear at the sight of the creature. The rancor roars and lumbers toward his former master.

{-} If the <color="red">Rancor</color> starts or ends his activation within 2 spaces of Kallenn, Kallenn is defeated.

You take a deep breath and ready yourself for the new challenge.

{-} The hero that powered down the Generator may test {I}. If successful, that hero gains 2 movement points.
{-} The Rebels win when Kallenn is defeated and both power cells are destroyed.

eventActions.shortText: Defeat Kallenn. Destroy the power cells (&Power Cells Destroyed&/2).

eventActions.theText:
{-} Kallenn performs an additional action during each activation and may perform multiple attacks during each activation.
{-} If the <color="red">Rancor</color> starts or ends his activation within 2 spaces of Kallenn, Kallenn is defeated.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent power cells. A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.
{-} The Rebels win when Kallenn is defeated and both power cells are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: You hear mechanical whirring and stomping steps behind you. You turn around, expecting more enemies, when the metallic frame of bounty hunter droid IG-88 steps out of the underbrush, his optical sensors eyeing you emotionlessly. There's a short pause then he lowers his weapon. "Identities confirmed", comes his voice from his speech processors. "Commence team-up as requested by Jabba."

eventActions.abilities:
Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 2 attack dice.
Relentless: When you declare an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 {C}.
Assault: You can perform multiple attacks each activation.

events.eventText:
The roar of a jetpack announces the arrival of another participant in the battle. Guns drawn and clad in his intimidating armor, none other than Boba Fett lands near Kallenn's base, eyeing you. "This is my team? Well, you don't look like much, but Jabba said you'd be worthwile. You better not let me down."

<color="yellow">If you don't own the figure, substitute it with any token.</color>

eventActions.abilities:
Battle Presence: After a hostile figure voluntarily exits a space adjacent to you, that figure suffers 1 {C}. Limit once per figure per round.
Battle Discipline: When you declare an attack, choose 1 of the following abilities to apply to that attack. +2 Ac. | {B} +2 {H} | {B} Recover 2 {H}
eventActions.eaName: Custom Deployment: Boba Fett (Infamous Bounty Hunter)

events.eventText:
A grim-looking, scarred man with a huge gun in his hands appears from the underbrush. The bounty hunter Dengar pauses when he sees you, then just nods in your direction. "Let's finish this, or that slug will be angry. Just don't get in my way."

<color="yellow">If you don't own the figure, substitute it with any token.</color>

eventActions.abilities:
Contempt: While attacking, if the target does not have a HARMFUl condition, apply +1 {B} to the attack results.
{B} Punishment: After the attack resolves, if the target suffered 1 or more {H}, choose 1 HARMFUL condition. The target  gains that condition. This ability can be triggered multiple times in the same attack.

events.eventText:
You hear a loud snarl as a huge Trandoshan in a washed-out yellow jumpsuit emerges from the underbrush. He takes a long look at you, tilts his head, then bares his teeth and moves past you, firing shots from his rifle at the Imperial forces.

<color="yellow">If you don't own the figure, substitute it with any token.</color>

eventActions.abilities:
{A} Indiscriminate Fire: Choose a space within 3 spaces and in your line of sight. Then, roll 1 green die. Each figure on or adjacent to that space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results and {C} equal to the {B} results.
Regenerate: At the end of each round, recover 2 {H} and discard all HARMFUL conditions.

events.eventText:
"De wanna wanga", a voice behind you says. A green-skinned Rodian carrying a blaster rifle looks at you with huge black eyes. "Coona tee-tocky malia?" Greedo shakes his head, then moves into position to attack the Imperials.

<color="yellow">If you don't own the figure, substitute it with any token.</color>

eventActions.abilities:
Slow on the Draw: When you declare an attack, the target may interrupt to perform an attack targeting you.
Parting Shot: When you have suffered {H} equal to your Health, before you are defeated, you may interrupt to perform an attack. Then, you are defeated.

events.eventText:
A grenade lands in your midst. You scramble for cover, but the detonation sends shrapnel flying. 

{-} Choose the space within 3 spaces of the most Rebel figures. Each Rebel figure within 3 spaces of that figure may test {J}. Each figures that succeeds suffers 1 {H}. Each figure that does not suffers 3 {H}.

One of the Imperial's best fighters rushes forth and attacks you violently.

{-} The highest-cost Imperial figure that can attack attacks {rebel}. Apply +1 {H} to that attack.

The Imperials fall back for a moment to recover from their wounds and plan their next assault.

{-} The highest-cost Imperial figure that has suffered {H} recovers 2 {H} and becomes <color="red">Focused</color>. If no Imperial figure has suffered {H}, the highest-cost Imperial figure becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

eventActions.repositionText: Block access to the power cells.

eventActions.shortText: Destroy both power cells (&Power Cells Destroyed&/2).

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent power cells. A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block  line of sight to power cells.
{-} The Rebels win when Kallenn is defeated and both power cells are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Kallenn performs an additional action during each activation and may perform multiple attacks during each activation.
{-} If the <color="red">Rancor</color> starts or ends his activation within 2 spaces of Kallenn, Kallenn is defeated.
{-} The Rebels win when Kallenn is defeated and both power cells are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The power cell collapses in an explosion of sparks and fire.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The power cells of Kallenn's facility hum with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.

events.eventText: The power cell collapses in an explosion of sparks and fire.

The power cells of Kallenn's facility hum with energy.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.

events.eventText:
As the last stormtrooper guarding the power generator falls, the way to shut down the generator is free.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.
{-} The mission will progress when the generator is powered down.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The main console of the power generator is blinking and humming.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to power down the generator.
{-} The mission will progress when the generator is powered down.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
Because Kallenn was defeated, the heroes receive 25 credits per hero.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a power cell (Health: 6, Defense: 1 {G}). A Rebel figure can interact with a power cell ({J} or {K}) to destroy it. Figures do not block line of sight to power cells.
